Key Match Events: Ferran Torres scored in the 13th minute to settle the contest.
Pre-Game Insights: Spain made 10 changes to their lineup for this match.
Albania sensed an opportunity to create history but were unable to capitalize.
Post-Match Reflections: Spain's performance solidified their status as title contenders.
Albania finished bottom of the group with just one point.
France, Netherlands, and England progressed to the next round before their final group matches.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Thousands of Albanian fans attended the match, creating a fever pitch atmosphere.
Aymeric Laporte was the only player retained from the previous match's lineup.
